decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Drawing Numbers: Page 1 of 3, Page 2 of 3,  2554-01, Type A System REHAU S706 1.0, Casement Sections 1 of 2,  Casement Sections 2 of 2, Type B System REHAU S719, VS SECTIONS 1 of 4,  VS SECTIONS 2 of 4, VS SECTIONS 3 of 4, VS SECTIONS 4 of 4 received 15/04/14.Letter received 23/07/14  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Prior to installation of the windows plans shall be submitted to the Local Authority to confirm that astragal bars and sash horns that replicate those in the current windows shall form part of the arrangement of the replacement. This shall be confirmed by the Local Planning Authority in writing,
description: Replacement of existing timber windows wtih uPVC windows
